mapper.insert: insert into t_scenicdetails (scenic_id, scenic_name, scenic_location, scenic_details, province, city, picture_url, ticket_price) values (#{scenicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scenicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scenicLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scenicDetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pictureUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ticketPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.update: update t_scenicdetails set scenic_name = #{scenicName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scenic_location = #{scenicLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scenic_details = #{scenicDetails,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture_url = #{pictureUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ticket_price = #{ticketPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where scenic_id = #{scenicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select scenic_id, scenic_name, scenic_location, scenic_details, province, city, picture_url, ticket_price from t_scenicdetails where scenic_id = #{scenicId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
